inn1.comm: defended on the front foot.
on the front foot and pushed to extra cover.
defended to the off side.
on the back foot and driven to point.
beats the outside edge and through to the keeper.
outside the off stump and left alone.
defended to the off side.
too wide outside the off stump and signaled a wide.
yorker dug out to the off side.
swinging in and Gayle watchfully plays on the front foot.
another in swinging yorker and Gayle gets his bat down in time.
plays forward and gets an inside edge down to fine leg.
beats the outside edge and through to the keeper.
defended on the front foot
the first breakthrough of the morning and Kulasekara strikes first, lovely away swing and gets the edge through to Sangakkara.
lovely delivery beats the outside edge of Bravo's bat.
outside  edge down to third man
another lovely delivery outside the off stump and beats the outside edge.
full delivery outside the off stump and Barath drives through the off side to deep extra cover.
beats the outside edge.
on the back foot and defended to the off side.
driven on the front foot to mid-on.
lets the ball go outside the off stump and through to Sangakkara.
defended on the front foot to the off side.
in the slot for Barath and he drives through cover and the ball races to the fence for a boundary.
outside the off stump and left alone.
attempted yorker, which turns out to be a low full toss and driven through midwicket to the deep.
another low full toss, chips it to the onside and picks up couple of runs.
defended on the front foot.
defended by Barath.
pushed to the off side to extra covers.
down the leg side and the impact is on the pad.
driven to the onside to mid-on.
back of a length delivery and Bravo on the back foot punches through extra cover to the deep.
defended on the back foot.
stays back in the crease and pushes to the off side to extra cover.
short of a length delivery and Barath defends on the back foot.
good swing into Barath, who plays watchfully. The ball was on target.
driven in the air back to the bowler, a tough chance for a catch, a drop by Mathews, goes to the fence for a boundary.
defended on the front foot.
looks to cut and gets beaten, through to Sangakkara.
outside edge and down to third man for a single.
defended on the front foot.
comes forward and defends, off the inside edge and on to the pads.
steers it down to third man for a single.
another tight delivery and Bravo meets the ball on the front foot and defends.
drives to mid-on and Mendis fields the ball.
short ball and Barath goes for a pull and gets a top-edge over the keeper and to the fence for a lucky boundary.
on the pads and worked behind square leg for a single.
driven firmly to extra cover and well fielded by Tharanga.
driven in the air over covers to the deep.
driven through extra cover for a single.
driven to mid-on and pushes for a quick single as Murali rushes to the ball.
outside the off stump and Barath angles his bat and runs it down to third man.
defended on the front foot.
this is wonderful bowling from Kulasekara, Bravo is forced to defend.
an away swinger and Bravo looking to drive, beats the outside edge and through to Sangakkara.
first ball on target and defended.
on the back foot and turned to short fine leg.
defended, watchfully played by Barath.

a chance for run out and third umpire is called into action for the first time today. Barath pushes to the onside, Bravo is half way down, stops in his tracks and he then turns and looks to get back into the crease, Kapugedera fields the ball and throws to Murali, who gets rid of the bails. There was no run there.
outside the off stump and cuts in the air over cover to the deep.
defended to the off side.
defended once again, Kulasekara is bowling tight lines here.
on the back foot and off the pads down to short fine leg.
defended on the front foot.
plays forward and the impact is on the pad, loud appeal and turned down by the umpire as it struck him outside the line of the off stump.
defended by Sarwan.
driven to the left of mid-off and picks up a quick single.
pushes to the onside and picks up a quick single.
defends to the off side.
pitches outside the leg stump and Barath glances it fine past the short fine leg fielder to the fence for his fourth boundary.
defended to the off side.
picks up a quick single to extra cover.
drives it down to the ground for a single.
driven wide of mid-on for a single.
defended on the front foot.
short ball and Barath plays on the back foot and pushes for a quick single.
beats the outside edge and through to the keeper.
driven to point.
defends with bat and pad close together, loud appeal by Mathews for lbw, has the ball struck the pad before hitting the pad, turned down by umpire Silva.
pushes for a quick single to the onside.
defended watchfully.
pushes to the onside to short midwicket.
sweeps the ball to deep square leg and picks up a single.
delicately plays it down to third man and picks up couple of runs.
moves back and defends to the off side.
drives to mid-off and picks up a quick single.
comes forward and defends.
played down to third man for a single.
Barath has a close look at Mendis and defends.
pushes to the off side for a quick single.
defended.
plays to the onside and picks up a quick single.
works it to backward square leg and picks up another single.
this time a sweep to deep backward square leg.
over-pitched delivery outside the off stump and driven on the front foot through cover.
angles the bat and runs it down to third man for a single.
short ball pulled down to fine leg for a single.
opens the face off the bat and steers it down to third man.
defended on the front foot.
on the pads and glanced down to fine leg for a single.
driven down the ground for a single.
driven on the front foot to mid-off.
fuller delivery outside the off stump and driven nicely through point for couple of runs.
defended to the off side.
strikes the pad outside the line of the off stump, loud appeal turned down.
defended watchfully this time by Sarwan.
on the front foot and driven to extra cover.
drives to deep point for a single.
defended to the off side.
opens the face off the bat and steers it down to third man.
outside the off stump and left alone.
angles the bat and plays it down to third man for a single.
the first six of the match from Sarwan, lofts it high and over the bowler and over the fence for a six.
plays forward and defends.
over-pitched delivery driven to deep point.
moves forward and steers it down to third man, picks up couple of runs and brings up his 50.
on the back foot and pushes to the onside.
driven down the ground to long on for a single.
pushes to the off side for a single.
on the back foot and works to the onside to midwicket for a single.
driven back down the track back to the bowler.
pushes to mid-off for a quick single.
another quick single behind square leg for a single.
cuts it down to sweeper cover for a single.
dropped at slip by Jayawardene, a tough chance.
defended to the off side.
drives to extra cover.
driven down the ground to long on.
in the slot for Barath, who drives it nicely through mid-off and to the fence for a boundary.
on the back foot and pushes to deep point for a single.
driven straight to the fielder at short extra cover.
defended watchfully.
angles his bat and plays it down to third man for a single.
short ball and pulled around to deep backward square leg.
defended on the back foot.
cuts it to deep point for a single.
driven down the ground to long on for a single.
comes down the track and drives down the ground to long off for a single.
driven straight to the fielder at backward point.
driven down the ground for a single.
on the front foot and works it through midwicket for a single.
drives it down the ground for a single.
cuts and gets it down to deep backward point, wonderful diving save by Mendis at the boundary line.
defended.
driven down the ground to long on.
pushes to the onside.
defended on the front foot.
driven down the ground for a single.
on the back foot and cuts it very late down to deep backward point.
defended to the off side.
half-volley outside the off stump and driven nicely through extra cover for a boundary.
hits it down the ground for a single.
cuts it to deep backward point, the sweeper runs across to field.
plays with an angled bat to third man.
works to the onside for a single.
turns it to deep square leg and picks up a single.
Barath is in fine form, down on one knee and swings it over the midwicket fence for a six, wonderful strike.
defended to the off side.
works to the onside and looking for the single, not there as Dilshan rushes in and prevents the single.
driven down the ground for a single.
doosra from Murali and beats Barath, Sangakkara misses a good stumping chance.
driven down the ground for a single.
outside the off stump, opens the face off the bat and steers it down to third man for a single.
driven in the air over Kapugedera at backward point for a single.
slow bouncer and Barath plays it watchfully to the off side.
driven on the front foot to extra cover.
another wonderful strike from Barath, swings it over the midwicket fence for his second six of the match.
works to the onside for a single.
driven down the ground for a single.
defended to the off side.
played down to short fine leg.
pushed to the onside to midwicket.
pushes to the onside, looking for a single, Dilshan rushes in and prevents the single.
driven down the ground for a single.
wonderful yorker and Sarwan digs it out.
outside the off stump, opens the face off the bat and steers it down to third man.
short ball and Barath pulls to deep backward square leg, wonderful save by Tharanga at the boundary line.
short ball and over Barath.
uppishly played down to third man.
spins the other way and Barth looking for the cut, gets beaten.
impact on the pad but it hits him outside the line.
off the pad down to short fine leg.
works to short fine leg.
sweeps it to deep backward square leg and picks up a single, brings up his 50, well played.
driven down the ground for a single.
another single down the ground.
too short from Mendis and Sarwan puts it away in style, pulls it to the deep midwicket fence.
worked to midwicket for a single.
works it off the back foot to backward square leg.
sweeps to deep midwicket for a single.
moves back and defends.
easy single down the ground.
pushes through covers for a single.
driven down the ground for a single.
comes down the track and plays it back to the bowler.
chips it over the fielder at mid-on for a single.
down the leg side and signaled a wide.
driven back to the bowler.
cuts it straight to point.
wonderful delivery, a yorker and Sarwan just digs it out.
another attempted yorker, which turns out to be a half-volley, nicely hammered down the ground for a boundary.
short ball pulled to deep backward square leg.
short delivery and Barath hooks it very well down to fine leg for a boundary, moves onto 96.
gets another couple of runs and moves to 98, makes room and drives to deep point. Excellent batting.
glances it down to fine leg fora single.
hesitation between the batsmen but they finally pick up the extra run.
chips it over the fielder at midwicket.
Barath gets to his century, wonderful knock, gets his first ODI century, wonderful stuff. Driven down the ground for a boundary, well played.
looking to run it down to third man, beats the outside edge and through to the keeper
driven through covers for couple of runs.
opens the face off the bat and steers it down to third man for a single.
opens the face off the bat and steers it down to third man.
too far outside the off stump.
comes forward and defends to the off side.
goes after the ball and gets an outside edge down to third man fence, Mathews had no chance to field the ball.
quick single behind point.
opens the face off the bat and runs it down to third man.
wonderful yorker from Malinga, almost had him in front of the stumps but there was an inside edge.
sweeps well and to the backward square leg fence for a boundary.
works to short fine leg.
plays to the onside for an easy single.
plays it down to third man.
on the back foot and cut to cover.
angles the bat and runs it down to third man for a single.
as expected a wicket goes down, hits it over mid-on, goes high in the air and Kapugedera judges it well and takes the catch. A good knock from Sarwan comes to an end.

Malinga gets another wicket, this time of the in-form Barath. They are losing wickets in the batting powerplay. Barath too goes the similar way to Sarwan, hits it down the ground to long on and Kapugedera once again takes the catch.
opens the face off the bat and runs it down to third man and gets off the mark.
yorker dug out by Chanderpaul.
pushes to the onside for a quick single.
glances it to fine leg.
on the back foot and works to the onside.
driven back to the bowler and that ends Murali's spell of bowling, and he goes wicket-less, 42 runs from his 10 overs.
worked to square leg for a single.
steers it down to short third man for a single.
bowled !  and wicket explodes, Pollard goes for a single digit figure. Slow in-swinger and Pollard does not pick it up, the ball knocks the leg stump, he played all over it.
pushes to the off side to extra cover and picks up a single.
played to extra cover and this time Tharanga prevents the single.
Sammy is the man and he puts the ball to the boundary. Driven down the ground and beats Mathews at mid-off, wonderful shot.
driven to extra cover.
yorker and Chanderpaul blocks it down the track.
pushes down the ground for a quick single.
wonderful strike from Sammy, low full toss and Sammy puts it away in style, flicks it all the way over the square leg fence for a six.
nice slower ball from Malinga and Sammy is hit on the box and he looks to be hurt.
chips it over mid-on for a single.
another slower one from Malinga, this is excellent bowling.
pushes to the onside for another single.
driven down the ground to long off for a single.
pushes to the onside for a single.
flicks it to deep square leg and picks up couple of runs.
looking to reverse sweep, hits him on the arm guard.
driven to midwicket for a single.
short ball pulled to deep backward square leg.
backs away and works to midwicket, well fielded by Mathews.
low full toss and played straight to midwicket. Wonderful final over from Kulasekara.
driven to extra cover for a single and that ends the West Indian innings.
